plugin_manifest.name: Elgg Workflow
plugin_manifest.author: Emmanuel Salomon @ManUtopiK
plugin_manifest.blurb: Collaboration tool for yourself and groups projects.
plugin_manifest.description: Elgg Workflow is a collaboration tool that organizes yours and groups projects into boards. It tells you what's being worked on, who's working on what, and where something is in a process.
plugin_manifest.license: GNU Affero General Public License, version 3 or later
